get.description: This endpoint can be used to obtain account summary information.

spotSubQuantity.description: Number of sub-accounts with spot trading permissions enabled

marginSubQuantity.description: Number of sub-accounts with margin trading permissions enabled

futuresSubQuantity.description: Number of sub-accounts with futures trading permissions enabled

optionSubQuantity.description: Number of sub-accounts with option trading permissions enabled

maxSubQuantity.description: Max. number of sub-accounts = maxDefaultSubQuantity + maxSpotSubQuantity

maxDefaultSubQuantity.description: Max. number of default open sub-accounts (according to VIP level)

maxSpotSubQuantity.description: Max. number of sub-accounts with additional spot trading permissions

maxMarginSubQuantity.description: Max. number of sub-accounts with additional margin trading permissions

maxFuturesSubQuantity.description: Max. number of sub-accounts with additional futures trading permissions

maxOptionSubQuantity.description: Max. number of sub-accounts with additional option trading permissions

get.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint can be used to obtain account summary information.

get.description: Get the api key information. Use the api key awaiting checking to call the endpoint. Both master and sub user's api key are applicable.

permission.description: [Permissions](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/doc-338144),  possible values: General, Spot, Margin, Futures, InnerTransfer, Transfer, Earn

isMaster.description: Whether it is the master account.

subName.description: Sub Name, There is no such param for the master account

get.x-sdk-method-description: Get the api key information. Use the api key awaiting checking to call the endpoint. Both master and sub user's api key are applicable.

get.description: This interface determines whether the current user is a spot high-frequency user or a spot low-frequency user.

data.description: Spot account type. True means the current user is a high-frequency spot user, False means the current user is a low-frequency spot user

get.x-sdk-method-description: This interface determines whether the current user is a spot high-frequency user or a spot low-frequency user.

get.description: Get a list of accounts. Please deposit funds into the main account first, then use the Transfer function to move them to the trade account before trading.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: currency

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Account type

type.description: Account type: main, trade, isolated (abandon), margin (abandon)

available.description: Funds available to withdraw or trade

holds.description: Funds on hold (not available for use)

get.x-sdk-method-description: Get a list of accounts. Please deposit funds into the main account first, then use the Transfer function to move them to the trade account before trading.

get.description: Get information for a single spot account. Use this endpoint when you know the accountId.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Path parameter. Account ID

available.description: Funds available to withdraw or trade

holds.description: Funds on hold (not available for use)

get.x-sdk-method-description: Get information for a single spot account. Use this endpoint when you know the accountId.

get.description: Request cross margin account info via this endpoint.

parameters.name: quoteCurrency
parameters.description: quote currency, currently only supports USDT, KCS, BTC, USDT as default

parameters.name: queryType
parameters.description: Query account type (default MARGIN), MARGIN - only query low frequency cross margin account, MARGIN_V2-only query high frequency cross margin account, ALL - consistent aggregate query with the web side

status.description: Position status; EFFECTIVE-effective, BANKRUPTCY-bankruptcy liquidation, LIQUIDATION-closing, REPAY-repayment, BORROW-borrowing

maxBorrowSize.description: The user's remaining maximum loan amount

get.x-sdk-method-description: Request cross margin account info via this endpoint.

get.description: Request isolated margin account info via this endpoint.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: For isolated trading pairs, query all without passing

parameters.name: quoteCurrency
parameters.description: quote currency, currently only supports USDT, KCS, BTC, USDT as default

parameters.name: queryType
parameters.description: Query account type (default ISOLATED), ISOLATED- - only query low frequency isolated margin account, ISOLATED_V2-only query high frequency isolated margin account, ALL - consistent aggregate query with the web side

status.description: Position status; EFFECTIVE-effective, BANKRUPTCY-bankruptcy liquidation, LIQUIDATION-closing, REPAY-repayment, BORROW-borrowing

maxBorrowSize.description: The user's remaining maximum loan amount
The user's remaining maximum loan amount

get.x-sdk-method-description: Request isolated margin account info via this endpoint.

get.description: Request futures account info via this endpoint.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Currency, Default XBT

marginBalance.description: Margin balance = positionMargin + orderMargin + frozenFunds + availableBalance - unrealizedPNL

maxWithdrawAmount.description: Maximum amount that can be withdrawn/transferred.

get.x-sdk-method-description: Request futures account info via this endpoint.

get.description: This interface is for transaction records from all your account types, supporting various currency inquiries. Items are paginated and sorted to show the latest first. See the Pagination section for retrieving additional entries after the first page.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Currency (you can choose more than one currency). You can specify a max. of 10 currencies in one go. If not specified, all currencies will be queried by default.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: direction: in, out

parameters.name: bizType
parameters.description: Type: DEPOSIT-deposit, WITHDRAW-withdraw, TRANSFER-transfer, SUB_TRANSFER-sub-account transfer, TRADE_EXCHANGE-trade, MARGIN_EXCHANGE-margin trade, KUCOIN_BONUS-bonus, BROKER_TRANSFER-Broker transfer record

parameters.name: startAt
parameters.description: Start time (milliseconds)

parameters.name: endAt
parameters.description: End time (milliseconds)

parameters.name: currentPage
parameters.description: Current request page.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of results per request. Minimum is 10, maximum is 500.

amount.description: The total amount of assets (fees included) involved in assets changes such as transactions, withdrawals and bonus distributions.

fee.description: Fees generated in transaction, withdrawal, etc.

balance.description: Remaining funds after the transaction. (Deprecated field, no actual use of the value field)

accountType.description: Master user account types: MAIN, TRADE, MARGIN or CONTRACT.

bizType.description: Business type leading to changes in funds, such as exchange, withdrawal, deposit, KUCOIN_BONUS, REFERRAL_BONUS, Lendings, etc.

context.description: Business related information such as order ID, serial no., etc.

get.x-sdk-method-description: This interface is for transaction records from all your account types, supporting various currency inquiries. Items are paginated and sorted to show the latest first. See the Pagination section for retrieving additional entries after the first page.

get.description: This API endpoint returns all transfer (in and out) records in high-frequency trading accounts and supports multi-coin queries. The query results are sorted in descending order by createdAt and ID.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Currency (you can choose more than one currency). You can specify a max. of 10 currencies in one go. If not specified, all currencies will be queried by default.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: direction: in, out

parameters.name: bizType
parameters.description: Transaction type

parameters.name: lastId
parameters.description: The ID of the last set of data from the previous data batch. By default, the latest information is given.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Default100, Max200

parameters.name: startAt
parameters.description: Start time (milliseconds)

parameters.name: endAt
parameters.description: End time (milliseconds)

balance.description: Total balance of funds after change

bizType.description: Trnasaction type, such as TRANSFER, TRADE_EXCHANGE, etc.

get.x-sdk-method-description: This API endpoint returns all transfer (in and out) records in high-frequency trading accounts and supports multi-coin queries. The query results are sorted in descending order by createdAt and ID.

get.description: This API endpoint returns all transfer (in and out) records in high-frequency margin trading accounts and supports multi-coin queries. The query results are sorted in descending order by createdAt and ID.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Currency optional; more than one can be selected; separate using commas; select no more than 10 currencies; the default will be to query for all currencies if left empty

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: direction: in, out

parameters.name: bizType
parameters.description: Transaction type: TRANSFER- transfer funds, MARGIN_EXCHANGE-cross margin trade, ISOLATED_EXCHANGE-isolated margin trade, LIQUIDATION-liquidation, ASSERT_RETURN-forced liquidation asset return

parameters.name: lastId
parameters.description: The ID of the last set of data from the previous data batch. By default, the latest information is given.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Default100, Max200

parameters.name: startAt
parameters.description: Start time (milliseconds)

parameters.name: endAt
parameters.description: End time (milliseconds)

balance.description: Total balance of funds after change

bizType.description: Trnasaction type, such as TRANSFER, TRADE_EXCHANGE, etc.

get.x-sdk-method-description: This API endpoint returns all transfer (in and out) records in high-frequency margin trading accounts and supports multi-coin queries. The query results are sorted in descending order by createdAt and ID.

get.description: This interface can query the ledger records of the futures business line.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Currency of transaction history, XBT or USDT

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type RealizedPNL-Realized profit and loss, Deposit-Deposit, Withdrawal-withdraw, Transferin-Transfer in, TransferOut-Transfer out

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Start offset. Generally, only the attributes of the last returned result of the previous request are used, and the first page is returned by default

parameters.name: forward
parameters.description: This parameter functions to judge whether the lookup is forward or not. True means “yes” and False means “no”. This parameter is set as true by default.

parameters.name: maxCount
parameters.description: Displayed size per page. The default size is 50

parameters.name: startAt
parameters.description: Start time (milliseconds)

parameters.name: endAt
parameters.description: End time (milliseconds)

type.description: Type: RealisedPNL, Deposit, Withdrawal, TransferIn, TransferOut

hasMore.description: Is it the last page? If it is false, it means it is the last page, and if it is true, it means you need to move to the next page.

get.x-sdk-method-description: This interface can query the ledger records of the futures business line.

get.description: Request margin account info via this endpoint.

holdBalance.description: Funds on hold in the account

get.x-sdk-method-description: Request margin account info via this endpoint.

get.summary: Get Account List - Isolated Margin - V1
get.description: Request the isolated margin account info list via this endpoint.

parameters.name: balanceCurrency
parameters.description: quote currency, currently only supports USDT, KCS, BTC, USDT as default

totalConversionBalance.description: The total balance of the isolated margin account (in the request coin)

liabilityConversionBalance.description: Total liabilities of the isolated margin account (in the request coin)

status.description: Position status: Existing liabilities-DEBT, No liabilities-CLEAR, Bankrupcy (after position enters a negative balance)-BANKRUPTCY, Existing borrowings-IN_BORROW, Existing repayments-IN_REPAY, Under liquidation-IN_LIQUIDATION, Under auto-renewal assets-IN_AUTO_RENEW .

get.x-sdk-method-description: Request the isolated margin account info list via this endpoint.

get.summary: Get Account Detail - Isolated Margin - V1
get.description: Request isolated margin account info via this endpoint.

status.description: Position status: Existing liabilities-DEBT, No liabilities-CLEAR, Bankrupcy (after position enters a negative balance)-BANKRUPTCY, Existing borrowings-IN_BORROW, Existing repayments-IN_REPAY, Under liquidation-IN_LIQUIDATION, Under auto-renewal assets-IN_AUTO_RENEW .

get.x-sdk-method-description: Request isolated margin account info via this endpoint.
